ComicInfo.Summary: Babewatch: Part II: Diabolique has turned all of Glory's male friends into women and brought them under her control. Glory teams up with the girls of Youngblood to rescue their teammates and set things right. Glory learns that Diabolique is her mother's twin sister.
ComicInfo.Title: Babewatch: Part II
